snippet: Relief agencies are acutely short of funds needed to prevent more carnage and deaths from hunger and disease, said the United Nations chief aid coordinator, Valerie Amos.
abstract: United Nations chief aid coordinator Valerie Amos warns that relief agencies are acutely short of funds needed to prevent more carnage and deaths from hunger and disease in Central African Republic.
lead_paragraph: Relief agencies are acutely short of funds needed to prevent more carnage and deaths from hunger and disease, said the United Nations chief aid coordinator, Valerie Amos.

headline.main: More Money Needed to Avert Disaster in Central African Republic, U.N. Warns
headline.print_headline: Aid Chief Makes Plea for the Central African Republic
